name: Planetary Protection
description:
A game made for the Saturday Jam with the theme What Leaves, Comes Back! This game was made in about 12 hours give or take, and was the first game jam I've ever participated in plus this is my first ever fully completed game. Sadly I ran out of time and had to use an asset pack instead of making my own art.

CONTROLS:

A/D to switch movement between left and right.
E to teleport ship to the other side of the planet.
Left Click to shoot.
ESC to go back to Main Menu

HOW IT WORKS

Defend Earth from a wave of asteroids! but watch out for your own lasers since they come back getting caught in Earths orbit.
